## AsJson type

Represents a type that can be serialized. No functions are allowed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type AsJson<T> = T extends string | number | boolean | null ? T : T extends Function ? never : T extends object ? {
    [K in keyof T]: AsJson<T[K]>;
} : never;
```
<b>References:</b> [AsJson](./optimistic-http.asjson.md)
